basics.name: Heesu Kim
basics.summary: Undergrad looking for life's purpose. Research interests in NLP, Cultural Bias, and Computer Vision.

work.summary: Worked on creating a dataset for measuring cultural bias; responsible for the Korean subset of the cultural bias MQA dataset.
Assigned to object detection and segmentation tasks in medical domain; fine-tuned foundational models for skin flap detection.

work.company: Defense Security Agency, Ministry of Defense
work.summary: Assisted with US-ROK joint operation through translation and interpretation; automated workflows using PowerShell.

publications.name: Hi-DARTS: Hierarchical Dynamically Adapting Reinforcement Trading System
publications.summary: Developed a multi-layer trading architecture based on reinforcement learning algorithms.

portfolio.name: Multilingual MQA Dataset for Cultural Bias Measuring
portfolio.description: Expanded previous work on cultural bias measuring datasets using Python and PyTorch.

portfolio.name: Closed-set Object Detection & Segmentation
portfolio.description: Constructed pipeline for YOLOv8/v11 and created custom semantic segmentation model with DINOv3 backbone.

portfolio.name: Workflow Process Automation Tool
portfolio.description: Implemented macro functions via Win32 API and PowerShell to automate repetitive actions.

awards.title: 3rd Place, Bias-a-Thon 2025 Track 1
awards.summary: Recognized for addressing demographic biases in Large Language Models.
